name: The King Ant
description:
Made for GameOff2021 with the theme Bug

*Edited for a bug that caused you to go into the ground when going through the door*

Navigate the anthill as the ants tell a story about their king.

Our original idea was that the player had bugged the enemy and would use the dialogue to solve puzzles. We overscoped and were trying to make a metroidvania game, on the last day we decided to make it smaller and easier so we could make sure the level design was not annoying.

Controls:

- WASD or Arrows to move

- E to interact

Programmer/Artist: PepperBoi

Designer/Artist: ForestPunk

Music: Anuman 

Github: https://github.com/gameDev422/the-king-ant
